attributes.action: call on Speaker Michael Martin to step down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Speaker has responded to the furore over MPs' expenses by shouting down those who dare to raise the issue in Parliament.

He has also spent considerable sums of money trying to prevent the people from finding out how these public servants have been milking the system.

He is clearly not the right person to be Speaker of the House of Commons and should be called upon to resign.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
